objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Drama lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about hobbies and free time using neutral register
Students create original drama themed content about hobbies and free time in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Drama story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in drama context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within drama theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with conflict
hobbies and free time with tension
hobbies and free time with struggle

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
